subject: Presidential Election of 2008
lead_paragraph: Around midnight of election day, I called my father in Las Vegas and let him hear the sobs of joy in the Harlem night. I’d finally experienced my own, long-awaited Joe Louis moment.
snippet: Around midnight of election day, I called my father in Las Vegas and let him hear the sobs of joy in the Harlem night. I’d finally experienced my own, long-awaited Joe Louis moment.
